text:
Ate here tonight. Amazing service from friendly staff and had an overall amazing experience. Although the menu is limited all the items are flavourful and great. The veal was amazing. The cream of sweet potato was also very good. Everyone was blown away from their meal

Will definitely be going back!
Belle place, repas correct, bon choix de vin et service parfait... Par contre pour le prix un peux plus de confort au chaise serait a considérer.

Nous y sommes allé récemment. Très impressionné par la bouffe et le service et l'atmosphère de la place. 
Pour les amateurs  de sangria, ils ont une sangria blanche qui à mon sens est la meilleure en ville

This is the "hip" place to eat in St Sauveur. Always packed, so you better make a reservation. Food is decent, but I feel that they are trying to be too sophisticated for their abilities. Still very good food and good service, but I stopped going there because a few times I was turned back for not having a reservation...
I loved it here. Great food, innovative menu and extensive wine list. Good music, trendy atmosphere and good crowd. I would certainly recommend when in the area. Keep up the good work!
Very cozy atmosphere and very very good food at reasonable price for the quality and quantity. The baked brie as an appetizer is really worth it and the pastas are very yummy.

Décor enrobant, atmosphère "hip", menu intéressant.
Salade verte un peu ordinaire MAIS leur ravioli au 3 fromages et huile de truffe...Omg!

Un peu bruyant pour un tête à tête mais parfait pour un bon souper entre amis!
Très beau décor, nourriture était excellente et bien présentée et excellent service! J'ai beaucoup aimé. J'y reviendrai!
Top choice. Fun staff, menu is a little limited, but the excellent food more than compensates. Super decor, trendy in a good way. I will return !
